message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with a machine learning problem of assigning items to categories based on similarity matrices. This falls under the broad category of machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The specific application of assigning keywords/tags to documents/pictures falls under natural language processing (cs.CL) and information retrieval (cs.IR). The paper also mentions the use of the model for partially tagged items, which could fall under the category of semi-supervised learning (cs.LG) or machine learning in general. Finally, the paper mentions the use of the model for categories with complex interrelations, which could fall under the category of social and information networks (cs.SI).
